channel.title: basketball on Taylor Riemersma's Work

item.title: Baylor to Win the Title
item.description: In the quest to create a perfect bracket using code, I, along with others, created code to create the best bracket there could be. As seen by this point, this has not gone exactly as planned. However as of Monday evening, this bracket held me in the 97.2 percentile of brackets on ESPN. That would not last for long. After writing this Monday night, things drastically changed. Colorado fell.
